attributes.action: Put India on the red list for travel
attributes.additional_details: Put India on the red list before this new variant goes out of control here and puts us into lockdown again causing lots more pain and suffering . This will keep people safer and  more confident in getting back to everyday life.
attributes.background: After everything the UK has been through and how far we have come we do not want a variant going out of control and affecting our vaccines . India is currently not on the red list but with the latest anouncement really feel that this should be done sooner rather than later.
